mapper.select: select s.module_id as id, s.module_name as name, s.priority, s.image_path from sys_module s

select s.module_id as id, s.module_name as name, s.priority, s.image_path from sys_module s where s.module_id in (select DISTINCT(b.MODULE_ID) as module_id from sys_user_menu a, sys_menu b where a.MENU_ID = b.MENU_ID and a.delete_state = 0 and b.delete_state = 0 and b.systerm_flag = '1' and a.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} UNION select DISTINCT(b.MODULE_ID) as module_id from sys_user_menu a, sys_menu b, dpcoi_user du where a.MENU_ID = b.MENU_ID and a.delete_state = 0 and b.delete_state = 0 and b.systerm_flag = '2' and du.sys_user_id = a.user_id and du.del_flag = '0' and du.dpcoi_user_state = '1' and a.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) order by s.module_id asc
